config_words.label: External Oscillator Selection

settings.label: XT (crystal oscillator) above 100 kHz, below 8 MHz
EC (external clock) for 500 kHz to 8 MHz

config_words.label: Reset Oscillator Selection

settings.label: HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 64 MHz and CDIV = 1:1
EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 4 MHz and CDIV = 4:1
EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits (device manufacturing default)

config_words.label: Clock out Enable bit
PRLOCKED One-Way Set Enable bit

settings.label: PRLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once
PRLOCKED bit can be set and cleared repeatedly

config_words.label: Clock Switch Enable bit

settings.label: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed

config_words.label: JTAG Enable bit

settings.label: Enable JTAG Boundary Scan mode and pins
Disable JTAG Boundary Scan mode, JTAG pins revert to user functions

config_words.label: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor Enable bit
Fail-Safe Clock Monitor -Primary XTAL Enable bit

settings.label: FSCM timer will not set FSCMP bit or OSFIF interrupt on Primary XTAL failure
FSCM timer will set FSCMP bit and OSFIF interrupt on Primary XTAL failure

config_words.label: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor -Secondary XTAL Enable bit

settings.label: FSCM timer will not set FSCMS bit or OSFIF interrupt on Secondary XTAL failure
FSCM timer will set FSCMS bit and OSFIF interrupt on Secondary XTAL failure

config_words.label: MCLR Enable bit

settings.label: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is MCLR; If LVP = 1, RE3 pin function is MCLR
If LVP = 0, MCLR pin function is port defined function; If LVP =1, RE3 pin fuction is MCLR

config_words.label: Power-up timer selection bits
Multi-vector enable bit

settings.label: Multi-vector enabled, Vector table used for interrupts
Interrupt contoller does not use vector table to prioritze interrupts

config_words.label: IVTLOCK bit One-way set enable bit

settings.label: IVTLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once
IVTLOCKED bit can be cleared and set repeatedly

config_words.label: Low Power BOR Enable bit
Brown-out Reset Enable bits

settings.label: Brown-out Reset enabled , SBOREN bit is ignored
Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep; SBOREN is ignored
Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN

config_words.label: Brown-out Reset Voltage Selection bits
ZCD Disable bit

settings.label: ZCD module is disabled. ZCD can be enabled by setting the ZCDSEN bit of ZCDCON
ZCD module is always enabled; ZCDMD and ZCDSEN bits are ignored

config_words.label: PPSLOCK bit One-Way Set Enable bit

settings.label: PPSLOCKED bit can be cleared and set only once; PPS registers remain locked after one clear/set cycle
PPSLOCKED bit can be set and cleared repeatedly (subject to the unlock sequence)

config_words.label: Stack Full/Underflow Reset Enable bit

settings.label: Stack full/underflow will not cause Reset

config_words.label: Low Voltage Programming Enable bit

settings.label: Low voltage programming enabled. MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR. MCLRE configuration bit is ignored
HV on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming

config_words.label: Extended Instruction Set Enable bit

settings.label: Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode disabled
Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode enabled

config_words.label: WDT Period selection bits

settings.label: Divider ratio 1:65536; software control of WDTPS

config_words.label: WDT operating mode

settings.label: WDT enabled while sleep=0, suspended when sleep=1; SWDTEN ignored
WDT enabled regardless of sleep; SWDTEN is ignored

config_words.label: WDT Window Select bits

settings.label: window delay = 87.5; no software control; keyed access required
window delay = 75 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
window delay = 62.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
window delay = 50 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
window delay = 37.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
window delay = 25 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
window always open (100%); no software control; keyed access required
window always open (100%); software control; keyed access not required

config_words.label: WDT input clock selector

settings.label: WDT reference clock is the 31.0 kHz LFINTOSC
WDT reference clock is the 32kHz MFINTOSC output

config_words.label: Boot Block Size selection bits
Boot Block enable bit
Storage Area Flash enable bit
Background Debugger
Boot Block Write Protection bit
Configuration Register Write Protection bit
Data EEPROM Write Protection bit
SAF Write protection bit
Application Block write protection bit
CRC on boot output pin selection

settings.label: CRC on boot output pin is RA4
CRC on boot output pin is RA2
CRC on boot output pin is RC4
CRC on boot output pin is RC5

config_words.label: CRC on boot output pin enable bit

settings.label: CRC on boot output pin disabled
CRC on boot output pin enabled, selected by BOOTPINSEL<1:0>

config_words.label: CRC on boot output pin open drain bit

settings.label: Pin drives both high-going and low-going signals

config_words.label: PFM and Data EEPROM Code Protection bit

settings.label: PFM and Data EEPROM code protection disabled
PFM and Data EEPROM code protection enabled

config_words.label: CRC on boot scan enable for boot area

settings.label: CRC on boot will not include the boot area of program memory in its calculation
CRC on boot will include the boot area of program memory in its calculation

config_words.label: CRC on boot Continue on Error for boot areas bit

settings.label: CRC on boot will stop device if error is detected in boot areas
CRC on boot will allow device to continue code execution regardless of error detection in boot areas

config_words.label: CRC on boot application code scan enable

settings.label: CRC on boot will not include the application area of program memory in its calculation
CRC on boot will include the application area of program memory in its calculation

config_words.label: CRC on boot SAF area scan enable

settings.label: CRC on boot will not include the SAF area of program memory in its calculation
CRC on boot will include the SAF area of program memory in its calculation

config_words.label: CRC on boot Data EEPROM scan enable

settings.label: CRC on boot will not include data EEPROM in its calculation
CRC on boot will include data EEPROM in its calculation

config_words.label: CRC on boot Config fuses scan enable

settings.label: CRC on boot will not include the configuration fuses in its calculation
CRC on boot will include the configuration fuses in its calculation

config_words.label: CRC on boot Continue on Error for non-boot areas bit

settings.label: CRC on boot will stop device if error is detected in non-boot areas
CRC on boot will allow device to continue code execution regardless of error detection in non-boot areas

config_words.label: Boot on CRC Enable bit

settings.label: CRC on boot will not run

config_words.label: Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 7-0
Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 7-0
Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 7-0
Non-Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Non-Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Non-Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Non-Boot Sector Polynomial for CRC on boot bits 7-0
Non-Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Non-Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Non-Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Non-Boot Sector Seed for CRC on boot bits 7-0
Non-Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 31-24
Non-Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 23-16
Non-Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 15-8
Non-Boot Sector Expected Result for CRC on boot bits 7-0
